Text: Enron Transportation Services travelers Cc Pamela I have electronic tickets that were issued for travel on Continental on September through the th These travelers were to attend the Southern Gas Association SGA Energy Accounting and Marketing Services Conference in New Orleans Due to the Terrorist attacks the conference was cancelled I realize the date falls outside the deadline for allowing reissuance of tickets with nonrefundable fares without penalty or administrative fee However these Enron employees have asked me to approach Continental on their behalf and request that their tickets be reissued to attend the conference on its rescheduled dates January without penalty I will be happy to supply a copy of the cancellationreschedule notice sent out by conference director or any other supporting documentation that might suffice The six travelersticket numbersprices are as follows BLAIRGRACE LYNN CALLANSNANCY MCDANIALJANET JOHNSONALICE HERNANDEZALBERT HANAGRIFFRICHARD Thank you in advance for anything you may be able to do to help these Enron travelers All best Elizabeth CC Rick Dietz Director Commercial Support Group ETS Lynn Blair Director Market Services ETS Alma Carrillo Administrative Assistant ETS Elizabeth Bouldin Agency Accounting The Travel Agency in the Park fax Effective November Fannin Suite Houston TX
